comments.body: I didn't know about `...args` thanks for this :+1:

Maybe, "NodeTimer"? "Timer" can cause conflicts with user's interfaces.
Also, in code timer is called "[Timeout](https://github.com/joyent/node/blob/master/lib/timers.js#L319)".

Another solution is creating module "timers" and moving interface to it.
Would welcome a PR with `NodeTimer`, Or `NodeTimeout` or `Timeout` whichever you want.
Yeah, I agree renaming it to NodeTimer would be good. (Timeout or NodeTimeout rubs me slightly the wrong way just because it's used with SetInterval too.)
